name: Flying Dragon Santa Clash
description:
Flying Dragon Santa Clash is specially designed for those fans who love Santa simulator & other dragon fighting games! Welcome to the Santa Clash 3D game of 2017 with full control of Santa Claus of Christmas & Mutant Dragon ready to fight.
Flying Dragon Santa Clash Game Play:
The game play of this Flying Dragon Santa Clash is just thrilling and action packed! You have control of mutant flying dragon and Christmas Santa Claus. You have to deliver the gifts from one point to kids of futuristic city! You are on a flying mutant Dragon! You have to throw fire on the enemy dragon who’s stopping you to deliver the Christmas gifts as Santa Simulator!
Flying Dragon Santa Clash Features:
Christmas Dragon fly with 10 action pack multiple levels.
Futuristic HD, 3D graphics of Gift delivery.
Detailed environment with different views.
Realistic sound effects of Santa Claus on having Dragon to deliver the gifts for kids.
Winter season city with Christmas 2017 & flying dragon.
Easy and smooth controls of Christmas Santa.

It’s actually the season of winter Christmas 2017 and each citizen of the whole futuristic city needs the Christmas gifts for kids and Santa Claus only one guy who can perform such type of interesting and enjoying task same as other Santa Christmas games.
Adventure with powerful dragons and become the ultimate magical creature in Dragon Sim Online, the fantasy RPG that puts you in the powerful wings of a dragon!
This Santa Clash is a Part adventure and part simulation 3D game! This Dragon simulator will take you on an epic journey as you build your warrior clan, use your magic, build your brood, defend against enemies that attack, and ultimately defeat all the mutant dragon fighters. Massive 3D open world Christmas Santa gift & 2018 gift simulator game.
Actually this is the world of flying dragons and Santa simulation of gifts around the beautiful kids of the futuristic city. Few years ago, there was no concept of Santa Claus and gift delivery on the season of winter Christmas riding on flying dragon of the futuristic city and people of the whole futuristic city used to deliver the gifts all around the Santa city by themselves without Santa Christmas game of gifting and holiday gift.
But after passage of time, now it is the need of daily life and kids think that there will be Santa Claus after riding on flying dragon and he will arise in futuristic city via mutant dragon fly with incredible gifting and amazing gifts for kids.
You might have played many Santa Clash & Christmas gift delivery games but this Flying Dragon Santa Clash game of winter Christmas will offer you flying environment and you will have to deliver the Christmas Gifts of 2018 to those kids who are waiting at the gift delivery point!
This Santa Clash game will offer you two in one experience like flying dragon fire throw and Santa Claus riding on flying dragon! You have never played such type of Dragon clash game because you’ll have full control of Incredible Dragon with mutant fire throw power and Flying Santa Christmas of winter 2017.
On this great eve of the Xmas year, we are releasing a special title to give you happiness and real feelings of Christmas with Super Santa. Super Santa is on a sitting of flying dragon in the city and delivering Christmas gifts to your loved ones kids of amazing city.
So get ready to become Santa Clause on flying dragon and deliver gifts on this Christmas of winter season 2018 to all the citizens around the 3D town with Santa games for kids. People will love your passion of spreading the joys among them in Christmas gift games and Santa gift delivery games with our Flying Dragon Santa Clash!
